metadata.description: This workbook displays the Defender for Cloud overall Secure Score of groups of subscriptions.
The gallery that the workbook will been shown under. Supported values include workbook, tsg, etc. Usually, this is 'workbook'
The id of resource instance to which the workbook will be associated
The unique guid for this workbook instance

properties.serializedData:
{"version":"Notebook/1.0","items":[{"type":1,"content":{"json":"# Secure Score Overview This workbook displays the Defender for Cloud overall Secure Score of groups of subscriptions. By default, it will load four groups; you select the subscriptions that represent a group.
